string.text: Imperial Loyalty
Minor Factions
Revolt Cooldown
The time before another revolt can arise in the same city.
Base Loyalty
The base loyalty of cities to the player.
Loyalty Change
Days until the city's loyalty to the new owner changes.
Loyalty Increase
The amount by which loyalty increases when the owner is in town.
Minimum Obediance
Minimal loyalty is required for the city's obedience to the owner.
Base Army Size
The base size of the revolting army, which gets spawned.
Army Prosperity Multiplier
This multiplier gets multiplied by the towns prosperity to add the amount to the base army size.
Activates/Deactivates the mechanic for the empire loyalty.
Activates/Deactivates the mechanics for overextension.
Affects Player
Does the overextension mechanism affect the player.
A multiplier to calculate overextension. This affects the city's loyalty to the owner.
Activates/Deactivates the mechanics for forming minor factions.
Seeing you spend time at {SETTLEMENT}, your subjects feel more loyal to you.
{SETTLEMENT} is revolting!
Town Loyalty
Revolutionary Mob
The people of {SETTLEMENT} seem to be content.
Flames of revolution are slowly stirring in {SETTLEMENT}.
Population is loyal to the {FACTION}.
Current revolt progress is {PROGRESS}%.
People are content with the current rule.
Many are inspired by tales of revolts in the kingdom.
Many are inspired by events at {SETTLEMENT}.
Some talk of raising banners of their homeland.
The people of this town had revolted recently, and don't wish to spill blood again.
After hearing of blood spilled in {SETTLEMENT} citizens are afraid of revolting.
